title: Savoury Bacon and Cheese Muffins
ingredients: ['100g lean bacon', '60g shallots, finely chopped', '300g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '75ml milk', '200g soured cream', '50g Cheddar or Gruyere cheese, grated', '15g Parmesan cheese, grated', 'caraway seeds for sprinkling (optional)']
